DOC.brief_summary: Specific Aim : The purpose study determine labor epidural placement use real-time ( concurrent ) ultrasound guide placement superior conventional `` standard '' epidural technique without use ultrasound Magee-Womens Hospital . Hypothesis : Ultrasound guide labor epidural placement real-time decrease traditional epidural failure rate 5 % 1 % .
DOC.brief_title: Real-time Ultrasound Guided Labor Epidural Placement
DOC.criteria: All pregnant woman childbearing age ( include child age 14 year ) request epidural analgesia MageeWomens Hospital eligible participate study . Men include .
